problem: Jimmy has 3 apples. Sarah gives him 2 more apples. How many apples does Jimmy have now?
There are 8 birds on a tree. 3 birds fly away. How many birds are left on the tree?
Lisa has 4 bags of marbles. Each bag has 3 marbles. How many marbles does Lisa have in total?
Mom made 12 cookies. She shared them equally among 3 friends. How many cookies did each friend get?
Sam had $5. He bought a toy car for $2 and a candy for $1. How much money does Sam have left?
If one box holds 12 crayons, how many crayons will be in 7 boxes?
A class of 24 students is divided into 6 equal groups. How many students are in each group?
Emma is saving money for a bike that costs $120. She has saved $75 so far. How much more money does she need to save?
If 144 stickers are divided equally among 12 children, how many stickers does each child get?
A recipe calls for 3/4 cup of flour. If you want to make 5 batches, how much flour do you need?
